objects.specification: A large square floor covering the entire booth area, crafted with realistic wooden plank textures featuring natural grain variations and warm light brown tones. The surface has a subtle matte finish with slight beveling along the edges to enhance depth and authenticity.

A full-height wall composed of clear glass panels set within slim brushed aluminum frames. The glass has a slight reflective sheen while the metal frame exhibits a modern industrial look with clean lines.

A glass-and-metal side wall segment featuring transparent tempered glass in a minimal metal frame. The brushed aluminum finish complements an open entrance layout, retaining a light industrial aesthetic.
A matching glass panel wall segment with slim metal framing in brushed aluminum. This half-height front section leaves the central entrance open while maintaining symmetry.
A side wall of continuous clear glass panels supported by slender metal mullions. The frame’s metallic finish gives a refined, contemporary appearance.
A glass-and-metal wall mirroring the opposite side, consisting of transparent panels and a matte aluminum frame, providing uniform light diffusion.

A large rectangular reception desk combining a warm oak veneer tabletop with matte black powder-coated steel legs and frame. It features smooth rounded corners and a modesty panel for a sleek professional presentation.
A tall open-frame display shelf with a vibrant cobalt blue powder-coated finish. It features evenly spaced horizontal shelves on a minimalistic steel frame, offering a clean modern look.
A matching vibrant blue display shelf unit constructed from powder-coated steel, with a slim profile and multiple open shelves for product presentation.
A third identical blue steel display shelf with a minimalist design, featuring an evenly spaced open shelving system to showcase items effectively.
A sleek interactive touchscreen kiosk mounted on a slender pedestal, finished in matte white. The tempered glass screen is angled for comfortable user interaction, with clean modern lines.
An interactive kiosk identical to the first, featuring a pristine white enclosure, integrated touchscreen, and minimalist pedestal design for user engagement.
A third white interactive kiosk with tempered glass touchscreen, ergonomic height, and subtle inward rotation to face the booth center, embodying modern simplicity.
The fourth kiosk unit matching the others, featuring a clean white finish, angled touchscreen, and pedestal base designed for seamless user access.
A circular lounge table with a smooth warm wood tabletop and beveled edge, supported by a matching cylindrical wood pedestal base. The design is inviting and contemporary.
A cozy lounge chair upholstered in soft warm-toned fabric with plush cushioning, featuring gently curved armrests and tapered wood legs for a welcoming feel.
A matching lounge chair with rich fabric upholstery and comfortable padding, featuring a modern silhouette, curved back, and stylish wooden legs.
A third warm-colored lounge chair with plush upholstery, ergonomic back support, and a contemporary wooden frame, arranged to foster conversation.
The fourth comfortable lounge chair in matching style, featuring warm fabric upholstery, cushioned seat, and tapered wooden legs for cohesive seating.
A rectangular product demo table with a dark gray matte surface and matching powder-coated steel frame. The minimalist design offers a sturdy platform for demonstrations.
A sleek bar stool with a round padded seat upholstered in black faux leather, supported by dark gray powder-coated steel legs and integrated footrest for comfort.
A second matching bar stool featuring a cushioned black seat and dark gray metal base with footrest, reflecting a streamlined modern aesthetic.
A round ceramic planter pot with a matte terracotta finish, filled with lush green foliage. The organic silhouette adds a natural decorative accent.
A matching terracotta-style ceramic pot containing vibrant green plant life, offering a refreshing botanical touch to the space.
An additional terracotta ceramic planter with matte texture and full foliage, providing organic warmth and visual interest.
A round matte-planter pot in terracotta hue, hosting green leaves that introduce natural texture and color contrast.
A fifth ceramic terracotta-style pot featuring a healthy green plant, enriching the booth environment with a botanical accent.
A suspended rectangular fabric banner in bright accent colors, featuring bold graphic patterns. The lightweight textile has a slight translucency and stitched hems for durability.
A central hanging banner flag made of vibrant printed fabric with a sleek hanging rod channel and subtle sheen, complementing the booth’s color scheme.
A third bright fabric banner with bold graphics, suspended from the ceiling. It features stitched edges and a lightweight design to flutter gently.
A ceiling-mounted cylindrical spotlight with matte black housing and adjustable head. It contains an integrated LED emitter for focused warm white illumination.
A directional LED spotlight in a sleek black cylinder, mounted flush to the ceiling. It provides targeted accent lighting over key display areas.
An adjustable downlight with a minimalist cylindrical form and matte black finish, delivering crisp accent light to highlight booth features.
A compact directional spotlight featuring a dark matte housing and precision LED beam, ideal for illuminating the lounge area with warm focused light.
A ceiling spotlight with matte black cylindrical body and adjustable head, providing soft directional light toward the demo station for clear visibility.
